about_the_game:
Rock 'n' Bones is a cute but hard platformer game where you move by throwing your head and teleporting to it! You play as Bones, a skeleton without a skull, and Rock, a... rock that was cursed with being alive. They travel together to find the witch who cursed them to be linked together and make her break the spell. Explore the witches castle and the surrounding areas, meet characters with quirky curses just like yours, find items that will help you get to the witch, and more in this charming pixel game!

You can't jump.

Instead, you move up by throwing your head and teleporting to it. You will need great focus and timing to throw the rock with correct strength so it lands where you want it to go, and if you miss, be ready to lose some of your progress because you have to teleport to it to throw it again!

Puzzles.

Sometimes you will stumble upon interesting puzzles that will need to be solved for you to go further. Be ready to use your head... or a rock in this case!

Find new upgrades.

Explore the world to find trinkets that will help you on your journey to find the witch!

Talk to NPCs.

You are not the only one cursed by the witch. Find different characters with their own little story and perhaps even a challenge for you! A person with a curse that makes you sit only on ledges? That's of course, the legendary Ledge Lord!

Features:

  • Funny and weird NPCs you can talk to.

  • Challenging gameplay.

  • Hidden secrets.

  • Retro inspired pixel art.

  • Items and collectibles to find.

  • And more!

This game is an entirely solo project made by Krystian "Felt" Barszczewski (that's me! :D). This includes art, sound effects, coding (this game was made in Godot Engine), designing levels, and gameplay. Thanks to everyone who pushed me further on this journey with positive words and gave me advice!

I hope you will like this game ^^

Music used in the teaser: Winter - Vivaldi, Lud and Schlatts Musical Emporium, Conducted by Philip Milman.

name: Rock 'n' Bones

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Explore this charming rage platformer by throwing your head (the rock) and teleporting to it! Listen to the rock poking fun at you, look for secrets, and collect powerups. Find the witch that made the rock alive against its will, or lack of, and make her break the spell!
